meanings.sent1: I will consult my teacher for help with my homework.
meanings.sent2: She decided to consult a doctor about her health concerns.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel consulted the wise old owl on where to find the best acorns.
meanings.sent4: Before making a decision, it's important to consult with those who have experience.
meanings.sent5: In times of uncertainty, it is wise to consult a trusted source for guidance.

meanings.definition: Refer to (a book, map, etc.) for guidance
meanings.sent1: When lost, it's helpful to consult a map to find your way.
meanings.sent2: Students often consult textbooks to find answers to their questions.
meanings.sent3: The chef had to consult the recipe book to remember the ingredients.
meanings.sent4: In preparation for the trip, she consulted the travel guide for tips.
meanings.sent5: Before starting the project, make sure to consult the instruction manual for guidance.

meanings.definition: Have a discussion with (someone) to give or receive information or advice
meanings.sent1: The team will consult with the manager before making any decisions.
meanings.sent2: It's important to consult with a financial advisor before investing money.
meanings.sent3: The penguin consulted with its friends on the best fishing spots.
meanings.sent4: Before finalizing the contract, the lawyer will consult with the client.
meanings.sent5: To ensure success, consult with your colleagues before implementing any changes.
